logo.description: A playful image of a cartoon cow wearing a crown, symbolizing the grandeur and fun of the amusement park.

sections.title: Welcome to Cattle Kingdom
sections.subtitle: The Ultimate Cow-fari Experience
sections.name: header
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Step into a world where adventure meets tradition at **Cattle Kingdom Adventure Park**. Nestled in wide open spaces, our park offers a unique blend of thrilling rides, authentic cattle experiences, and tantalizing food, ensuring fun for the entire family.

images.name: Park Entrance Image
images.description: A vibrant photo capturing guests entering the park through a grand archway shaped like a massive bull's head.

sections.title: About Cattle Kingdom
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content:
Established with a vision to combine the timeless charm of cattle ranching with modern amusement, Cattle Kingdom brings to life a magical experience for all ages. 

From exhilarating rides to serene cow-back adventures, there's something for everyone. Gaze over our spectacular pastures from the top of the "Gamble Graze", or enjoy a peaceful meal while watching the beauty of roaming cattle. Our dedication is to preserve the cultural legacy of ranching while providing unparalleled entertainment.

images.name: Park Scenery
images.description: Beautiful views of the cattle and park attractions at sunset.

sections.title: Our Services and Attractions
sections.subtitle: Rides, Games, and Gastronomy
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
### Enjoy:  
- **Cattle Rides:** Experience the gentle giant rides on our well-cared cattle with options for all ages.  
- **The Rodeo Rush:** Thrill to the dynamic excitement of rodeo-themed rides.  
- **Cowboy Casino:** Channel your inner gambler and join classic and modern games of chance!  
- **Authentic Eats:** Relish delicious, locally sourced steaks and burgers at our signature restaurant "Grazers."  
- **Cattle Exhibitions:** Learn about and interact with our splendid herd, each cow with its own story.  
- **Gamble Graze:** An exciting chance to win exclusive prizes!  

Discover more when you visit us, as we add seasonal attractions and events.

images.name: Cow Riding Image
images.description: Visitors having fun riding on real cows with trained handlers.

images.name: Casino games
images.description: A variety of games available at the Cowboy Casino.

sections.title: Meet Our Stars
sections.subtitle: The Cattle of Cattle Kingdom
sections.name: our_cattle
sections.label: Cattle
sections.content:
Meet the heart of Cattle Kingdom—our cherished cows:  
- **Bessie:** Loves frosty mornings and crunching on fresh clover.  
- **Mooana:** Known for her quirky spots and love for photo ops!  
- **Daisy:** A gentle giant and our most mature ride-worthy cattle.  

Each member of our herd is lovingly cared for, ensuring their wellbeing and happiness.

images.name: Cattle Portraits
images.description: A collection of portraits of our cows, each with their unique personality.

sections.title: Past Medical Treatments
sections.subtitle: Our Care Commitment
sections.name: medical
sections.label: Care
sections.content:
Our cattle receive the utmost care with regular medical check-ups and treatments as needed to ensure they remain healthy and happy.  

**Recent Treatments Include:**  
- **Bessie:** Regular hoof care and vaccinations.  
- **Mooana:** Dental check-up in June.  
- **Daisy:** Skin allergy treatment last month.

images.name: Treatment Chart
images.description: An infographic showing the treatment timeline and care routines for our cows.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Join the Adventure Today
sections.name: contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
### Get in Touch!  
We're excited to hear from you whether you're planning a visit or have questions.  

- **Address:** 234 Pasture Lane, Moo Town, TX  
- **Email:** contact@cattlekingdom.com  
- **Phone:** 1-800-COW-FUNN  

**Opening Hours:**  
Monday to Friday - 09:00 AM to 09:00 PM  
Saturday and Sunday - 08:00 AM to 10:00 PM
